articles.author: Mark Brown
articles.title: Ernesto Guzman, 12, faced challenges before he became the youngest Illinois resident to die of COVID-19 - Chicago Sun-Times
articles.description: Ernesto Guzman faced numerous health challenges, and as pressure grows to reopen the state, will more children like him face the same fate?
articles.content:
Ernesto Guzman, age 12, on Thursday became the youngest Illinois resident known to have died from complications of COVID-19. 
Ernesto was not a healthy boy, to be sure. 
Since age 6, he had suffered the effects of Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease, a genetic nerv… [+4337 chars]
